frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind layers defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark themes, including background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, border, and sidebar colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO meta tags (title, description, keywords), Open Graph and Twitter card metadata for 'Evergreen Hub - Learn. Earn. Grow.' affiliate marketing website.

frontend/src/components/EvergreenAIChatb: A draggable floating chatbot widget with rule-based responses for FAQs about courses, packages, pricing, and support. Features animated border, message history, and mobile-friendly touch interactions.
frontend/src/components/FAQSection.tsx: An accordion-based FAQ section displaying common questions about affiliate marketing, experience requirements, results timeline, support, and earning potential. Uses scroll animation for reveal effects.
frontend/src/components/FloatingWhatsApp: A fixed-position floating button linking to WhatsApp with a pre-filled message and masked phone number display. Features hover animations and floating effects.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: A footer component with brand information, social media links (Facebook, Instagram, YouTube), quick navigation links, and decorative animated floating dots. Includes copyright and made-with-love attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Main navigation header component with responsive design, featuring logo, theme toggle, authentication state handling, and dropdown menus for user/admin accounts with mobile sidebar support.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Landing page hero section with animated background, call-to-action buttons for course purchase and WhatsApp contact, and trust indicators showing student count, courses, and support availability.
frontend/src/components/InstagramSection: Instagram profile promotion section with animated card displaying username, follow button, and gradient styling using scroll-based visibility animations.
frontend/src/components/MobileSidebar.ts: Mobile-only slide-out navigation drawer with theme-aware gradient backgrounds, decorative animations, and navigation links for home, about, courses, and dashboard access.
frontend/src/components/PaymentGateway.t: Payment information display component showing PhonePe QR code, masked bank account details (India Post Payment Bank), and step-by-step payment instructions for users.
frontend/src/components/PaymentModal.tsx: Modal dialog for completing course purchases, integrating PaymentGateway and PaymentProofForm components with mutation handling for submitting payment proof to the backend actor.
frontend/src/components/PaymentProofForm: Form component for submitting payment proof with transaction ID and screenshot upload, includes progress tracking, validation, and WhatsApp support link.
frontend/src/components/PricingSection.t: Displays six course packages (E-lite to Ultra Pro) with pricing from ₹699 to ₹14999, handles authentication-gated purchases and opens payment modal.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: Route guard component that redirects unauthenticated users to login and enforces admin-only access for specific routes.
frontend/src/components/ScrollToTopButto: Floating button that appears after scrolling 300px down and smoothly scrolls the page back to top when clicked.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialsSect: Displays three customer testimonials with 5-star ratings in a grid layout with scroll animation effects.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggleSwitc: Button component that toggles between light and dark themes with animated sun/moon icons.
frontend/src/components/VideoEditingSect: Marketing section for ₹500 video editing service showcasing four features with payment modal and WhatsApp contact integration.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseUsSecti: Displays four benefit cards (beginner training, guidance, lifetime access, WhatsApp support) with images and scroll animations.
frontend/src/components/YouTubeSection.t: Displays a YouTube channel section with an embedded video player, channel information, and a subscribe button linking to the Evergreen Hub YouTube channel. Uses scroll animation hook for fade-in effect.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Provides authentication context managing Internet Identity login/logout, user profile state, admin status, and profile refresh functionality. Integrates with actor and query client for data management.
frontend/src/contexts/ThemeContext.tsx: Manages theme state (light/dark/system) with localStorage persistence and system preference detection. Applies theme classes to document root element.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, handling both anonymous and authenticated states. Initializes access control and invalidates dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality, identity management, and status tracking. Creates AuthClient with configurable options and handles identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching backend data including packages, payment proofs, user profiles, admin stats, earnings, withdrawal requests, and landing pages. All queries depend on actor availability.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollAnimation.ts: Custom hook using IntersectionObserver to detect when an element enters viewport and trigger visibility state changes. Supports configurable threshold, root margin, and single/repeated triggering.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Tailwind directives, defines CSS custom properties for light/dark theme colors using OKLCH color space, and includes custom keyframe animations for hero sections, buttons, and UI effects like fade-in, zoom, glow, and ripple.
frontend/src/layouts/AdminDashboardLayou: Admin dashboard layout component with a sidebar navigation for dashboard stats, user management, package management, payment management, and withdrawal management. Includes mobile responsive sheet menu and requires admin authentication via ProtectedRoute.
frontend/src/layouts/UserDashboardLayout: User dashboard layout component with sidebar navigation for home, dashboard, packages, withdrawal requests, landing page builder, profile settings, and password change. frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider for data fetching, InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUs.tsx: About Us page component that describes Evergreen Hub as a digital learning and earning platform, uses scroll animations for sections, and includes SEO meta tags. Features Header, Footer, FloatingWhatsAppButton, EvergreenAIChatbot, and ScrollToTopButton components.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminStats.tsx: Admin dashboard statistics page displaying total users, sales, revenue, and pending payments in card widgets with auto-refresh every 30 seconds.
frontend/src/pages/admin/PackageManageme: Admin page for managing course packages with a table view, add/edit/delete functionality, status toggle switches, and a modal for package creation/editing.
frontend/src/pages/admin/PaymentManageme: Admin page for reviewing payment proofs with filtering by status, approve/reject actions, screenshot viewing modal, and displays user and package information.

frontend/src/pages/AdminLogin.tsx: Admin login page that authenticates users via Internet Identity and verifies admin role before allowing access to admin dashboard. Redirects non-admin users to regular dashboard and shows loading states during authentication.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page displaying WhatsApp and phone contact options with call-to-action buttons. Includes Header, Footer, InstagramSection, and FloatingWhatsAppButton components with a gradient card layout for contact methods.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page component that authenticates users via Internet Identity, displays a login form with remember-me checkbox, and redirects authenticated users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/Register.tsx: Registration page component that validates user input (name, email, phone, password), authenticates via Internet Identity, then registers the user with the backend actor.
frontend/src/pages/user/ChangePassword.t: Informational page explaining that password management is handled through Internet Identity's cryptographic authentication system rather than traditional passwords.
frontend/src/pages/user/DashboardOvervie: User dashboard displaying earnings statistics (today, weekly, monthly, total), payment proofs, and package purchase summaries with status badges.
frontend/src/pages/user/LandingPageBuild: User interface for creating, editing, and deleting custom landing pages with title, content, and template selection using CRUD mutations.
frontend/src/pages/user/MyPackages.tsx: Displays user's purchased packages with payment proof details, transaction IDs, and approval status badges.
User profile editing form allowing updates to name and phone number while displaying read-only email field.
frontend/src/pages/user/WithdrawalReques: User page for creating and viewing withdrawal requests with form inputs for amount and message, table displaying request history with status badges (approved/pending/rejected), and React Query integration for data fetching and mutations.
